001package Corner_Detection_Tests;
002
003import java.awt.Graphics2D;
004import java.awt.Shape;
005import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
006import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
007import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
008
009import ij.ImagePlus;
010import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
011import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
012import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageGraphics;
013
014public class Make_Corner_Test_Image1 implements PlugIn {
015        
016        static int width = 512;
017        static int height = 512;
018
019        @Override
020        public void run(String arg) {
021
022                ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(width, height);
023                ip.setColor(128);
024                ip.fill();
025                
026                
027                AffineTransform T = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(2.3, 0);
028                
029                int N = 31;
030                double deltaAngle = 2 * Math.PI / N;
031                
032                try (ImageGraphics g = new ImageGraphics(ip)) {
033                        Graphics2D g2 = g.getGraphics();
034                        g.setColor(255);
035                        //Shape s = makeTriangle(10, 15, 30, 40, 15, 50);
036                        Shape rect = new Rectangle2D.Double(50, 300, 20, 15);
037                        for (int i=0; i<2*N; i++) {
038                                double angle = deltaAngle * i;
039                                AffineTransform R = AffineTransform.getRotateInstance(angle, 0.5*width, 0.5*height);
040                                Shape s = R.createTransformedShape(rect);
041                                g2.fill(s);
042                                rect = T.createTransformedShape(rect);
043                        }
044                }
045                
046                (new ImagePlus("Corner Test", ip)).show();
047        }
048        
049        Shape makeTriangle(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2) {
050                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();      
051                poly.moveTo(x0, y0);
052                poly.lineTo(x1, y1);
053                poly.lineTo(x2, y2);
054                poly.closePath();
055                return poly;
056        }
057
058}
